name: JOY
description:
Insights from the Dreaming Pool - Bliss, love, held, nurtured by exquisite kernels.

“Find a place where there is joy and the joy will burn out the pain” - Joseph Campbell

Like the baby that’s nurtured in the womb Joy within becomes Joy without and Joy without nurtures Joy within.

What brings you Joy? 
Think of it now

Is it the slow moving clouds drifting across the sky? Is it the feel and sound of the waves crashing against the rocks? Is it the sway and soft motion of the wind playing with the leaves and branches of the tree? Is it the smile of your loved one? Is it the opening of your heart to the beauty within each moment as you breathe in and out? Sweet joy, sweet bliss, feel what brings you joy. Notice what that is like within you. As you breathe feel the joy in your cells expanding through your body and out as far as you want it to go.

The Dreaming Pool Oracle is a collaboration between artists Maia Mellier 🕸 🕷 (@maiamellier) & AEVIN (@aevin_io)
